suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Hospital, Valdemoro', 'title': 'Penthouse in Calle Alcalde Antonio Pariente Cuesta'}
description: Mr. House Real Estate is delighted to present a SPECTACULAR, NEARLY NEW PENTHOUSE in the BEST AREA of Valdemoro! On this occasion, Mr. House Real Estate offers you an EXCLUSIVE PENTHOUSE located next to Valdemoro Hospital. This is a residence of approximately 90m2, featuring 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, a furnished kitchen, and a living-dining area. There's a 45m2 TERRACE that surrounds the entire property, accessible from all rooms. Additionally, 2 PARKING SPACES AND A STORAGE ROOM are included in the price. This penthouse is equipped with the finest quality features, including DUCTED AIR CONDITIONING, individual natural gas heating, tilt-and-turn double-glazed windows, parquet floors, smooth paint, white lacquered doors, and a PERGOLA ON THE TERRACE, among others. It boasts HIGH ENERGY EFFICIENCY with a 'B' certification. The property is located within an EXTRAORDINARY PRIVATE URBANIZATION that offers all sorts of conveniences. There's a POOL with a lawn area and umbrellas, a paddle tennis court, a children's play area, landscaped gardens, a concierge, ACCESS FOR PEOPLE WITH REDUCED MOBILITY, and more. Furthermore, it's situated near all types of services (just meters away from Valdemoro Hospital, bus stops, easy access to A-4/R-4/M-506, and the NOBELIS private school). REQUEST FURTHER INFORMATION WITH NO OBLIGATION! At Mr. House Real Estate, we DO NOT CHARGE PURCHASE COMMISSIONS OR FEES FOR MORTGAGE MANAGEMENT!

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Zona Estación, Valdemoro', 'title': 'House'}
description: In the idyllic enclave of Valdemoro, where comfort meets nature, a distinguished villa emerges that personifies elegance and comfort.This exceptional property, just 35 minutes from Sol, offers an exclusive refuge with immediate access to urban vitality and at the same time, natural tranquility just 5 minutes walk from the "Las Bolitas" Natural Park. With impeccable architecture and a meticulously planned interior design, this 4-bedroom villa is a residential work to enjoy, its design is contemporary.The spacious rooms are enhanced by refined details and a layout that perfectly combines functionality. A private and versatile nook, the loft adds a distinctive touch to the space, providing an additional area for personalized use, whether as a study, games room or even a quiet retreat space.Each room, carefully distributed, becomes a sanctuary of comfort and style. The spacious living room on the ground floor with a hallway designed so that there is no shortage of light, leading to the more than comfortable kitchen, gives a really necessary touch of spaciousness. The own garden, an oasis of serenity, invites you to moments of relaxation in the open air.With its perfectly maintained green areas, this space becomes a perfect setting for social events or simply to enjoy the peace in private.The common areas, highlighted by a generously sized swimming pool, with bathroom and shower facilities add a touch of comfort and offer an opportunity to have an area to enjoy the Madrid climate in summer. The enclosed garage provides security and convenience, ensuring that your arrival home is always comfortable.The strategic location not only brings you closer to the energy of Sol, but also allows you to immerse yourself in the natural beauty of "Las Bolitas" with just a few steps. This chalet is more than a residence; It is a lifestyle.Discover the perfect balance between urban comfort and the natural serenity of being next to nature in this property in Valdemoro. suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Centro, Valdemoro', 'title': 'Flat in Calle Ruiz de Alda'}
description: WE DO NOT CHARGE COMMISSION TO THE BUYER Apartment for sale on Ruiz de Alda street in the old town of Valdemoro.The house is part of a community built in 1995 and has a small patio with private access for the owners. THE BEST OF THIS HOUSING - Excellent state of conservation: the apartment was renovated in the 2000s and the bathroom was renovated in 2018. - Bright and interior rooms, which minimizes the perception of noise. - Three built-in wardrobes in the house Its 71m2 are distributed: -Hall with built-in wardrobe -Kitchen (sold without appliances) with views of Ruiz de Alda street -Living room with views of Ruiz de Alda street -Main room, with built-in wardrobe overlooking the community patio -Children's room, with built-in wardrobe overlooking the community patio. About area and transport: Valdemoro is a municipality and a town located in the south of the Community of Madrid.It is located 25.21 kilometers from the capital, 27 kilometers if it is by road, in the Castilian region of La Sagra, although it is generally also included in the Madrid Metropolitan Area. In the last fifteen years it has suffered strong population growth.The proximity to the capital has fostered the demographic and economic development of the town.The population increase has made it necessary to build new transport infrastructures, as well as educational, health and leisure infrastructures. The recent history of the municipality is linked to the Civil Guard, since Valdemoro is home to the Duque de Ahumada Young Guards College, a training center for future members of the corps.

description: Incredible opportunity! A spacious apartment with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms for sale in Valde. This property has a large living room and kitchen, as well as a 12 square meter terrace with access from the living room and kitchen. It also includes a 4-meter storage room and a garage space. This luxury apartment has an air conditioning system, individual aerothermal equipment, low consumption and high performance, in addition to being soundproofed and having double flow ventilation for clean and purified air. Heating and cooling is done through underfloor heating, with digital thermostats in each room.
